content:
// 保存表单-商品信息
    saveGoodsInfo() {
      const data = new FormData();
      data.append("task_title", this.task_title);
      data.append("pid",this.pid)
      data.append("tid",this.tid)
      data.append("free_shopping",this.free_shopping)
      this.goods.forEach((item,i)=>{
        data.append(`goods[${i}].image_url`,item.image_url)
        data.append(`goods[${i}].goods_url`,item.goods_url)
        data.append(`goods[${i}].goods_name`,item.goods_name)
        data.append(`goods[${i}].goods_count`,item.goods_count)
        data.append(`goods[${i}].goods_actual_price`,item.goods_actual_price)
        data.append(`goods[${i}].goods_display_price`,item.goods_display_price)
      })
      console.log(data.get('goods_name'));
      this.$axios({
        headers: {
          Authorization: "Bearer " + this.$store.state.token,
        },
        method: "POST",
        url: this.$store.state.host + "/business.php/PublishTask/saveStepTwo",
        data,
      }).then((res) => {
        console.log(res);
      });
    },
for (var i = 0; i < data.goods.length; i++) {
        data.goods_url.push(data.goods[i].goods_url);
        data.goods_name.push(data.goods[i].goods_name);
        data.image_url.push(data.goods[i].image_url);
        data.goods_count.push(data.goods[i].goods_count);
        data.goods_actual_price.push(data.goods[i].goods_actual_price);
        data.goods_display_price.push(data.goods[i].goods_display_price);
      }
      data.goods_url = data.goods_url.join();
      data.goods_name = data.goods_name.join();
      data.image_url = data.image_url.join();
      data.goods_count = data.goods_count.join();
      data.goods_display_price = data.goods_display_price.join();
      data.goods_actual_price = data.goods_actual_price.join();
